speaker: JOSEPHO (V.O.)
line: The bible says God appeared to Moses in a burning bush. He came to Jesus on a mountain-top. For Buddha, God came while he sat under a tree. God came to me in a vision in the desert February 26, 1991.

speaker: JOSEPHO (V.O.)
line: My recon squad had engaged Saddam's army in a small Bedouin encampment. We'd been ambushed, taken all by surprise and there were casualties.

speaker: SOLDIER #1
line: My legs -- I can't feel my legs. worry.

speaker: SOLDIER #1
line: My legs... here!

speaker: SOLDIER #2
line: Zulu six two, we are under attack. Repeat: We are under attack. We are taking heavy machine-gun fire...

speaker: JOSEPHO (V.O.)
line: We were holding our perimeter, and we might've held up but on this day, I had a terrible sense of foreboding and I saw the future of those brave men and they were about to die.

speaker: [CLOSED-CAPTION SAYS
line: ... and I saw the failure of those brave men... ]

speaker: JOSEPHO (V.O.)
line: Death came to take my men... but not me. I was left as a witness to a vision.

speaker: JOSEPHO (V.O.)
line: Angels from heaven.

speaker: JOSPEHO
line: "Behold, a whirlwind came out of the north and a brightness was about it. And out of the midst came the likeness of four living creatures and they had the likeness of a man."

speaker: JOSEPHO (V.O.)
line: I knew why my life had been spared. That I was to deliver the message of these angels. These sons of god.

speaker: FADE TO THE PRESENT
line: nan

speaker: JOSEPHO (V.O.)
line: To deliver the message of the god who came before all other gods.

speaker: NARRATOR
line: Previously on the X-Files: crashing into the hillside and the bike exploding.]

speaker: DOGGETT
line: A man crossed over the U.S./Canadian border last night. He's one of ours -- he was infiltrating a religious group. Some kind of whacked-out UFO cult.

speaker: KERSH
line: ... Led by a former military officer -- a very dangerous man.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'll kill you if you touch my baby!

speaker: REYES
line: The boy has some connection with this thing -- this piece of metal. So must this cult who are more than willing to kill for their belief.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I need to know that you're taking him to a safe place.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: ... At 7:00 this evening, in a Washington D.C. Alley a vehicle carrying the son of Agent Dana Scully was forced to a violent stop by a female shooter who proceeded to kidnap the child at gunpoint.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: The van was being driven by three men asked by Agent Scully to protect the child. The three men are currently working to ID the assailant.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: John Doggett was seriously injured by the same female shooter as he tried to halt her vehicle. Agent Doggett remains in a coma under close watch at St. Mary's Hospital.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: This kidnapping follows on the heels of a failed attack on Scully's child by another FBI agent, Robert Comer. He remains in critical condition also at St. Mary's.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Now, this man's motives and the motives of the female kidnapper are still unknown.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Let me emphasize that the FBI has no reason to believe that it cannot affect the safe return of Agent Scully's child.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Scully!

speaker: SKINNER
line: What are you doing? I thought I told you you didn't need to be here.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I just had to see this for myself.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Go home.

speaker: SCULLY
line: To what?

speaker: SKINNER
line: I'm just saying, you don't need to put yourself through this, Dana. We've got every stop pulled; every available agent working to find your son.

speaker: SCULLY
line: ... And A.D. Brad Follmer leading the charge.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Deputy Director Kersh asked him to take the lead. He knows how to run a task force. I think you see that in there.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I see a man who withholds information for Kersh. A man who not once but twice failed to prevent an attack on my son. You see a task force in there. I see a whitewash.

speaker: SKINNER
line: I know you're upset but you can't possibly accuse Follmer or Kersh of having any part in this.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What is it going to take for you? How many people have to be taken out for you to open your eyes to it? My son... Agent Doggett... Mulder.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Kersh protected you by not telling you reports of Mulder's death. As did Follmer. As did I.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You call it protection. I call it a systematic effort inside the FBI to eliminate us.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You accuse anyone of anything in the FBI you have to accuse me along with them.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Scully, where are you going?

speaker: SCULLY
line: To find my son.

speaker: REYES
line: Hi.

speaker: REYES
line: His hands are so cold.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Have you talked to the doctors yet?

speaker: REYES
line: They say the good news is that there's no swelling of the brain but they were very frank that he could just never wake up.

speaker: REYES
line: I wonder if he can hear us.

speaker: SKINNER
line: There'd be soldiers in Vietnam... bodies turned inside out... I'd hold their hands just like you're doing. Tell them it was going to be okay.

speaker: REYES
line: Do you think it helped? Talking to them?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Well... I always thought it was like... like praying. Even if they can't hear maybe... God can.

speaker: REYES
line: No change.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I need to see you right away, Monica. Are you alone right now?

speaker: REYES
line: Skinner's here with me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'd prefer if Skinner didn't know.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We found her.

speaker: REYES
line: Who?

speaker: SCULLY
line: The woman who took William.

speaker: SCULLY
line: She's a wanted felon and a part of the UFO cult that the FBI was investigating. I need anything that you can find on her, Monica but I need you to get it quietly.

speaker: REYES
line: If they ID'd the woman then why isn't the FBI investigating it?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I asked them not to tell the FBI.

speaker: REYES
line: What are you doing, Dana?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm trying to get my son back.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: We're locked on.

speaker: LANGLY
line: Like there was ever a doubt.

speaker: BYERS
line: Which beings us that much closer to finding William. Langly's inside the system.

speaker: LANGLY
line: I'm hacked inside the phone company. Going to use their mainframe to scan the map for a locator signal.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Before William was kidnapped, Byers was able to tuck a cell phone under the padding of the baby's car seat.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: Call the phone, and Langly can use the signal to find its location. Find the phone, find the baby.

speaker: REYES
line: You mean, assuming the kidnapper hasn't found the phone.

speaker: BYERS
line: We'll keep trying.

speaker: REYES
line: This is madness, and you know it. They failed you once with your child. They're going to fail you again.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Then I'll find him myself.

speaker: REYES
line: You can't do this alone.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Look, what alternative do I have... when the FBI is all but telling me they think that my son is already dead? Pennsylvania off the interstate.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You coming with me? Or am I going alone?

speaker: CULT MAN #1
line: It's moving! It's moving! need some tools. Go get some tools! Come on, move it!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Federal Agent!

speaker: REYES
line: John Doggett... where is he? He's not in his bed.

speaker: NURSE
line: They've taken him down to radiology to run a cat scan. Would you like me to call down to his doctor?

speaker: REYES
line: No. No, I was just worried. I'm sorry.

speaker: REYES
line: What?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Nothing.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: I've known you a long time and this just seems, uh... a little traditional for you.

speaker: REYES
line: Maybe when you're lost you knock at the door with the porch light on.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Hey... hey...

speaker: FOLLMER
line: I want you to know, I'm doing all I can to find the woman who did this. Even though we got people inside the FBI working against us.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: It was foolish going after her by yourselves. We could have been there long before you, Monica. Could have even captured the suspect. Instead, she got away.

speaker: REYES
line: This is complicated, Brad. If you came in here to bust me...

speaker: FOLLMER
line: No. No. I came here to ask for your cooperation. Not sharing information creates an atmosphere of distrust and then I'm less apt to share my information with you.

speaker: REYES
line: What haven't you shared with me?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: This FBI agent who tried to kill Scully's baby has come around. He's got something he wants to tell us.

speaker: REYES
line: What?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: I need your cooperation.

speaker: REYES
line: You said he tried to tell you something. How is that possible?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: He didn't tell me exactly. He wrote it down.

speaker: REYES
line: I don't know what this means.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: I don't know, either. But it means something. And I want to know what.

speaker: SEGUE TO
line: nan

speaker: SCULLY
line: Just tell me where you got this.

speaker: REYES
line: You know what it means?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Robert Comer wrote this, didn't he? The FBI Agent who tried to kill my son, and how did you get it?

speaker: REYES
line: I got it under the condition that I share what I learn from you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Take it.

speaker: REYES
line: What is it? What does it mean?

speaker: SCULLY
line: If I don't tell you you're good on your word, right? That means that you've learned absolutely nothing from me.

speaker: REYES
line: Where are you going?

speaker: SCULLY
line: To the hospital.

speaker: REYES
line: Hey, it doesn't work that way.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Look, this began when the Agent lying in that hospital crashed his motorcycle running the border from Canada. Somehow, he got to Washington without a scratch and he tried to kill my son. Now, tell me, how did he do that, Monica?

speaker: SCULLY
line: With something I found in his jacket pocket in a jacket that he wore to my house that I put three shots in.

speaker: REYES
line: The artifact... piece of the ship.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Let go.

speaker: REYES
line: My god.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Let go of my hand. Turn off the monitors, or they're going to alert somebody.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Now, tell me who sent you to kill my son or I will take that pillow from under your head and make them the last breaths that you take.

speaker: COMER
line: Your son has to die.

speaker: COMER
line: I'm not what you think. Please... please... the FBI sent me uncover on a man named Josepho to get inside his cult whose followers believe an alien race will rule the world.

speaker: COMER
line: One day god told Josepho to lead us a thousand miles north to find a ship buried in the ground. You have a piece of that ship in your hand. Josepho believes that that ship is a temple which houses the physical manifestation of god.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you saying that god asked you to kill my child?

speaker: COMER
line: No. Josepho said god spoke to him of a miracle child. A future saviour coveted by forces of good and evil. Josepho believes your son is this child.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Then why does he want to kill him?

speaker: COMER
line: He doesn't. He wants to protect him. Josepho believes your son will follow in his father's paths and try and stop the aliens' return. Unless his father was to be killed. That is the prophesy.

speaker: REYES
line: You came here to kill her son against this man and his cult? To stop them? Are you saying you believe this prophesy but acted alone?

speaker: SCULLY
line: What he's saying is that Mulder is dead. That that's true. That they killed him to fulfil this prophesy.

speaker: COMER
line: And that your son must die, too. Or everyone... all of mankind will perish from earth. Please... please... let me.

speaker: NURSE
line: What is going on here?

speaker: TOOTHPICK MAN
line: What are you doing in here?

speaker: NURSE
line: They turned off all the monitors. They removed his intubation.

speaker: TOOTHPICK MAN
line: What are you doing in here?

speaker: SCULLY
line: This patient does not need support. He's breathing on his own.

speaker: TOOTHPICK MAN
line: Step outside. Both of you.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: It's not working.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: You weren't followed?

speaker: OVERCOAT WOMAN
line: No.

speaker: JOSPEHO
line: He's safe now. He's safe with us.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Where are Scully and Reyes?

speaker: TOOTHPICK MAN
line: They were told to wait out here.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are we going to tell them?

speaker: REYES
line: Who?

speaker: SCULLY
line: The FBI about Agent Comer. About what just happened. About how he was healed.

speaker: REYES
line: Just tell them the truth.

speaker: SCULLY
line: They're not on our side. They will use the truth against us.

speaker: REYES
line: Dana, you don't believe what you heard in there. You don't believe what that man was telling you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How can you doubt him? I mean, after everything that you've just witnessed. After what you saw with my son. something terribly wrong. From the very moment that he was conceived.

speaker: REYES
line: Your child was a miracle, Dana. I don't doubt that the things I've witnessed are any less miraculous. But your son is not an abomination -- a thing that should cease to exist. You tell me on that ship is written scripture from the world's great religions. Tell me a religion that decrees the death of a child. Not just your child but any child. This is a man saying these things to us. How many religions warn of false prophets? Men sent to deceive us?

speaker: REYES
line: The only thing that I believe is that your son may still be alive and we can find him and save him. And with that object in that room we can save Agent Doggett, too.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You two better get out here. Agent Comer's dead.

speaker: REYES
line: What?!

speaker: REYES
line: This man was alive. You saw him. He was alive.

speaker: REYES
line: Somebody was in here. Where did it go?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Where did what go?

speaker: REYES
line: This man had something in his hand. A small piece of metal. It's what revived him. I-it's why he could be taken off life support.

speaker: NURSE
line: A piece of metal? I don't know what she's talking about.

speaker: REYES
line: Who else came into this room?

speaker: NURSE
line: Why are you questioning me?

speaker: REYES
line: Did you leave the room?

speaker: REYES
line: This woman came in here, and this man was alive. He was more than alive.

speaker: REYES
line: He'd been healed. He'd been brought back to life. This man was murdered, but it wasn't by us.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Agent... Reyes.

speaker: REYES
line: You were in here.

speaker: TOOTHPICK MAN
line: I came in and found you.

speaker: REYES
line: Were you alone in here? Was he alone in here?

speaker: TOOTHPICK MAN
line: She went to get the doctors.

speaker: REYES
line: Search this man.

speaker: TOOTHPICK MAN
line: For what?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Monica!

speaker: REYES
line: Agent Scully... Where's Scully? Agent Scully!

speaker: SCULLY
line: I never meant for this. All that's been lost. I never meant to put you at risk -- to risk losing you, too. She's fighting for you. Monica's out there trying to find a way. And she's not going to let you go.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Agent Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Doggett. Oh...

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I heard someone talking.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah, that was me. That was me talking to you.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: No, it wasn't you.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: They're going to come to you, but you can't trust them. Do you understand that?

speaker: REYES
line: Agent Scully.

speaker: REYES
line: Oh, my god.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: Listen carefully, Agent Scully.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: You want to see your son? You come alone and you follow my instructions to the letter.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: Sorry to keep you waiting but I had to make sure you were alone. I only wish to protect the boy from those who'd harm him. He's a very special boy.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I came here to take him back.

speaker: JOSPEHO
line: "Behold, a whirlwind came out of the north and a brightness was about it. And out of the midst came the likeness of four living creatures. And they had the likeness of a man." That's the bible. Did you know it?

speaker: SCULLY
line: "Ephesians." cloud, and a fire infolding itself, and a brightness was about it, and out of the midst thereof as the colour of amber, out of the midst of the fire. Also out of the midst thereof came the likeness of four living creatures. And ]

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: The bible... describing giants who walk the earth. Who'd believe it? Only the faithful and we who have seen them. These... Super Soldiers. The true Sons of God.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I want to see my son.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: You struggle to believe. It's so incredible but your son will lead this alien race. He was put here to lead.

speaker: JOSPEHO
line: I'll bring you to him, to see your son. After you do something for me. After you bring something I need. Confirmation that Mulder's dead.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You killed Mulder.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: No. I believed he was dead... but now I have reason to doubt that. And if he's alive he's the one thing preventing your son's true destiny.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You told me I could see my son. You lied.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: If you want to see the boy... you'll bring me the head of Fox Mulder.

speaker: REYES
line: Hold on.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: His car is wired.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What about these hills? Are we going to lose him in these hills?

speaker: FROHIKE
line: Yeah, yeah.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: How are we in terrain?

speaker: LANGLY
line: That transponder will track this guy driving under water to Brazil.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: Uh... yeah.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: Turn.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, they have to get it back.

speaker: LANGLY
line: Piece of crap!

speaker: FROHIKE
line: Here, you be the messenger.

speaker: JOSEPHO
line: What is it? What's happening?

speaker: OVERCOAT WOMAN
line: The baby started crying... and it just came to life

speaker: REYES
line: Hey, guys, we lost him. And we just ran out of road out here.

speaker: SCULLY
line: William?

speaker: SCULLY
line: William!

speaker: SCULLY
line: William!

speaker: SCULLY
line: No...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh, my god.

speaker: REYES
line: Dana...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh, my...

speaker: SCULLY
line: William?

speaker: REYES
line: I came to give you a ride home. They told me you were in here.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Yeah.

speaker: REYES
line: I came in here and prayed for you.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Yeah, I know.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: This voice in my head, it was... it was talking to me telling me to get up... telling me to warn Scully about this man. I mean... was it you talking to me?

speaker: REYES
line: I only prayed for your life.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Uh, Deputy Director?

speaker: KERSH
line: Mr. Follmer.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Sir, it's, um... it's about that report you have there. The investigation of Special Agent Robert Comer's death.

speaker: KERSH
line: Yes?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: As you know, A.D. Skinner refused to sign it believing that Agent Comer was murdered in his hospital bed.

speaker: KERSH
line: But you did sign it, isn't that right, Mr. Follmer? Finding nothing to support that allegation.

speaker: FOLLMER
line: Well... that's just it, sir. I did find something. The monitors in Agent Comer's room they recorded his condition moment by moment... showing that his vital signs did improve just before his equipment was unplugged. They did, in fact... return back to normal.

speaker: KERSH
line: And you have an explanation for that, yes?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: No, sir, I don't.

speaker: KERSH
line: And you want what?

speaker: FOLLMER
line: I just want to take my name off it.

speaker: KERSH
line: Maybe if you weren't so busy backpedalling, Mr. Follmer, you might get me an explanation. Excuse me.

speaker: KERSH
line: I'm sure you heard all of that.

speaker: KERSH
line: Congratulations -- it would appear now that everything is dead but this case.

speaker: TOOTHPICK MAN
line: I'm sure I can take care of that, Deputy Director. Quite sure.
